Package com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.theme.base

Interface BackgroundAware<T extends BackgroundAware<T>>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - The type of the dynamic theme.
    All Superinterfaces:
    BaseTheme<T>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AppTheme, AppWidgetTheme
    public interface BackgroundAware<T extends BackgroundAware<T>>
extends BaseTheme<T>
    A BaseTheme to implement a background aware theme.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      int getBackgroundAware()
      Returns the background aware functionality used by this theme.

      Returns the contrast ratio for by this theme.

        @NonNull
T setBackgroundAware​(int backgroundAware)
        Set the background aware functionality used by this theme.
        Parameters:
        backgroundAware - The background aware functionality to be set.
        Returns:
        The BackgroundAware object to allow for chaining of calls to set methods.
